title: Starting a Weird Conversation: Funny, Creative, & Thought-Provoking Openers

steps.title: If you had to live in a fictional world, what would it be and why?
steps.content: If you had to live in a fictional world, what would it be and why?

steps.title: What’s your biggest irrational fear?
steps.content: What’s your biggest irrational fear?

steps.title: If you had to fight any historical figure, who would it be and why?
steps.content: If you had to fight any historical figure, who would it be and why?

steps.title: Do you believe in conspiracy theories? If so, what’s your favorite one?
steps.content: Do you believe in conspiracy theories? If so, what’s your favorite one?

steps.title: Excuse me, what’s your Hogwarts house?
steps.content: Excuse me, what’s your Hogwarts house?

steps.title: Walk me through your ideal funeral.
steps.content: Walk me through your ideal funeral.

steps.title: Most attractive cartoon character?
steps.content: Most attractive cartoon character?

steps.title: Do you have any public restroom horror stories?
steps.content: Do you have any public restroom horror stories?

steps.title: If you could only eat 3 foods for the rest of your life, what would they be?
steps.content: If you could only eat 3 foods for the rest of your life, what would they be?

steps.title: What’s the worst movie you’ve ever seen?
steps.content: What’s the worst movie you’ve ever seen?

steps.title: If you were born 100 years earlier, what would your occupation be?
steps.content: If you were born 100 years earlier, what would your occupation be?

steps.title: Create your perfect band with 5 solo artists, dead or alive.
steps.content: Create your perfect band with 5 solo artists, dead or alive.

steps.title: Is a hot dog a sandwich? Why or why not?
steps.content: Is a hot dog a sandwich? Why or why not?

steps.title: Rank every Shrek movie from best to worst.
steps.content: Rank every Shrek movie from best to worst.

steps.title: Quick question: do you wet your toothbrush before or after adding toothpaste?
steps.content: Quick question: do you wet your toothbrush before or after adding toothpaste?

steps.title: Do you believe in aliens? Why or why not?
steps.content: Do you believe in aliens? Why or why not?

steps.title: What’s the funniest thing you believed in as a child?
steps.content: What’s the funniest thing you believed in as a child?

steps.title: Would you rather fight 100 zombie-sized chickens or 100 chicken-sized zombies?
steps.content: Would you rather fight 100 zombie-sized chickens or 100 chicken-sized zombies?

steps.title: If you could remove one state from the US, which would it be and why?
steps.content: If you could remove one state from the US, which would it be and why?

steps.title: What’s your favorite form of potato?
steps.content: What’s your favorite form of potato?

steps.title: What scientific experiment would you perform (if money and ethics weren’t an issue)?
steps.content: What scientific experiment would you perform (if money and ethics weren’t an issue)?

steps.title: Where’s the most inappropriate place you’ve farted?
steps.content: Where’s the most inappropriate place you’ve farted?

steps.title: Would you rather only be able to sing to communicate or dance to get from one place to another?
steps.content: Would you rather only be able to sing to communicate or dance to get from one place to another?

steps.title: If you could be any age for one year, what age would you pick and why?
steps.content: If you could be any age for one year, what age would you pick and why?

steps.title: Describe the last time you snitched on someone.
steps.content: Describe the last time you snitched on someone.

steps.title: Do you talk to yourself? If so, what do you talk about?
steps.content: Do you talk to yourself? If so, what do you talk about?

steps.title: How long would you last in a zombie apocalypse?
steps.content: How long would you last in a zombie apocalypse?

steps.title: If you could eliminate one word from existence, what would it be and why?
steps.content: If you could eliminate one word from existence, what would it be and why?

steps.title: If you were invisible for a day, what would you do?
steps.content: If you were invisible for a day, what would you do?

steps.title: Would you rather explore space or the deep sea?
steps.content: Would you rather explore space or the deep sea?

steps.title: If you had to lose a limb, which one would it be and why?
steps.content: If you had to lose a limb, which one would it be and why?

steps.title: If you had to rename the color red, what would you name it?
steps.content: If you had to rename the color red, what would you name it?

steps.title: Would you rather watch the same movie or listen to the same song for a year?
steps.content: Would you rather watch the same movie or listen to the same song for a year?

steps.title: What’s the weirdest dream you’ve ever had?
steps.content: What’s the weirdest dream you’ve ever had?

steps.title: What’s your favorite celebrity scandal?
steps.content: What’s your favorite celebrity scandal?

steps.title: Would you rather detect any lie you hear or get away with any lie you tell?
steps.content: Would you rather detect any lie you hear or get away with any lie you tell?

steps.title: How early do you get to the airport?
steps.content: How early do you get to the airport?

steps.title: What’s the worst gift you’ve ever received?
steps.content: What’s the worst gift you’ve ever received?

steps.title: If you could make one thing illegal, what would it be and why?
steps.content: If you could make one thing illegal, what would it be and why?

steps.title: Which reality TV show would you audition for?
steps.content: Which reality TV show would you audition for?

steps.title: What’s the strangest thing about your culture?
steps.content: What’s the strangest thing about your culture?

steps.title: Give me 3 unpopular opinions–GO!
steps.content: Give me 3 unpopular opinions–GO!

steps.title: What’s the scariest movie you watched as a child?
steps.content: What’s the scariest movie you watched as a child?

steps.title: What inanimate object do you want to be reincarnated as and why?
steps.content: What inanimate object do you want to be reincarnated as and why?

steps.title: What could you write a book about?
steps.content: What could you write a book about?

steps.title: Would you rather be fluent in every language or be able to communicate with animals?
steps.content: Would you rather be fluent in every language or be able to communicate with animals?

steps.title: If you were the president, which national holiday would you declare?
steps.content: If you were the president, which national holiday would you declare?

steps.title: If you became famous, what would it be for?
steps.content: If you became famous, what would it be for?

steps.title: Would you rather never sleep again or never eat again?
steps.content: Would you rather never sleep again or never eat again?

steps.title: If you could time-travel, which year would you go to?
steps.content: If you could time-travel, which year would you go to?

steps.title: If you could invite 3 people to a dinner party, dead or alive, who would they be and why?
steps.content: If you could invite 3 people to a dinner party, dead or alive, who would they be and why?
